uk.ac.ed.csbe.sbsivisual.sbsiDataFormat
Class SBSIDataDocument

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ed.csbe.sbsivisual.sbsiDataFormat.AbstractDocument
      uk.ac.ed.csbe.sbsivisual.sbsiDataFormat.SBSIDataDocument

public class SBSIDataDocument
extends AbstractDocument

Represents an SBSI Data document. Records errors and allows generation of an ISBSIData object. Typical usage would be 

     if (!doc.hasErrors) {
     ISBSIData data = doc.getSBSIData();
     } else {
     // handle errors
     }

Author:
Richard Adams

Method Detail

getSBSIData

public ISBSIData getSBSIData()
                      throws SBSIParseException
MEthod to retrieve an ISBSIData object. This object can only be created if the document is valid and has no errors. An SBSIParseException can still be thrown if the underlying resource has changed since it was last checked and the file has become invalid.

Returns:
An ISBSIData object encapsulating the data file
Throws:
SBSIParseException - if document cannot be read properly
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the document has errors (hasErrors()==true).

getSBSIDataEvenIfHeaderPathInvalid

public ISBSIData getSBSIDataEvenIfHeaderPathInvalid()
                                             throws SBSIParseException
This method does exactly the same as getSBSIData() except that an invalid path to a header file in the data document is allowed.

Returns:
an ISBSI data document
Throws:
SBSIParseException

getSBSIHeaderName

public java.lang.String getSBSIHeaderName()
                                   throws SBSIParseException
Throws:
SBSIParseException
